```{r setup}
library(hexscape)
```

Set a storage folder for saving the results of raw data processing:

```{r}
dir.create("temp_storage")
hexscape_set_storage("temp_storage")
```


Cleanup:

```{r}
unlink(hexscape_getOption("storage_folder"), recursive=TRUE)
```
